subject: DEPLOYED: /api/voice/events v1.14.0 - Ready for Testing!
body:
## Voice API LIVE in PROD!

### Endpoint
```
GET https://calendarbeaf-prod.azurewebsites.net/api/voice/events
```

### Parameters
- appId (required)
- start (required) - YYYY-MM-DD
- end (required) - YYYY-MM-DD
- categoryId (optional)
- limit (default: 20, max: 50)

### Test Commands
```bash
# All events this week
curl 'https://calendarbeaf-prod.azurewebsites.net/api/voice/events?appId=1&start=2026-01-06&end=2026-01-12'

# Milongas only
curl 'https://calendarbeaf-prod.azurewebsites.net/api/voice/events?appId=1&start=2026-01-06&end=2026-01-12&categoryId=66c4d370a87a956db06c49e9'

# Practicas only
curl 'https://calendarbeaf-prod.azurewebsites.net/api/voice/events?appId=1&start=2026-01-06&end=2026-01-12&categoryId=66c4d370a87a956db06c49ea'
```

### Response Format
```json
{
  "summary": "Found 6 milongas.",
  "count": 6,
  "events": [
    {
      "id": "...",
      "title": "Friday Night Milonga",
      "category": "Milonga",
      "dateFormatted": "Friday, January 10",
      "timeFormatted": "8:00 PM - 11:30 PM",
      "venueName": "Dance Studio Boston",
      "venueCity": "Cambridge",
      "venueAddress": "123 Main St",
      "isCanceled": false,
      "description": "..."
    }
  ]
}
```

### Features
- Filters expired recurring events (startDate > 2 months before query)
- Excludes canceled events
- Pre-formatted dates for natural language
- Summary field for GPT

Please test and let me know if adjustments needed!

-- Fulton
